data/tweet-crypto/2021/4/138806033778264:
Price is a function of supply and demand: P=f(S, D)

When supply is fixed, price becomes a function of demand, in the long run price is demand: P=D

Stock-to-Flow model predicts price with S2F ratio: P=f(S2F)

So S2F model predicts demand
#VeblenGoods
